result.title: Will there be live coverage for VK Cup 2015 Finals?
result.content:
According to VK Cup's page,
VK Cup 2015 Finals is going to be held on July 24 â€” 27.

As we're coming close to that date,
I'm wondering: Will there be any live coverage (scoreboard, livestreams ..etc.) for the event?
I cannot seem to obtain more info besides the date.

I personally would love to witness these bright coders battle against each other.
(( Thank you in advance : )
